description.narrative: Project to use digital solutions to support women business entrepreneurs within the informal sector using business accelerator.

activity-description.narrative: Area in which the activity will be implemented.

description.narrative: seat of a first-order administrative division

activity-description.narrative: Area in which the activity will be implemented.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1 - # of new female entrepreneur users of the financial product (using at least 1x month) Output Indicator 1.2 - % of new female users reporting saving money using the product Output Indicator 1.3 - % of new female users reporting feeling more financially independent Output Indicator 2.1 - # of female participants participating in the business accelerator Output Indicator 2.2 : % of female participants of the business accelerator using new digital tools for their business Output Indicator 2.3: % of participants of the accelerator who report increased digital literacy Output Indicator 2.4 : % of participants of in the accelerator who report feeling more able to handle economic shock Output Indicator 3.1 : Total value of microgrants disbursed to female entrepreneurs Output Indicator 3.2 : % of female entrepreneurs who report being able to sustain or grow their business with grant

comment.narrative:
Output Indicator 1.1: Baseline = 0
Output Indicator 1.2: Baseline = 0
Output Indicator 1.3: Baseline = 0%
Output Indicator 2.1: Baseline = 0
Output Indicator 2.2: Baseline = 0%
Output Indicator 2.3: Baseline = 0%
Output Indicator 2.4: Baseline: 0%
Output Indicator 3.1: Baseline = $0
Output Indicator 3.2 Baseline = 0%

Output Indicator 1.1 Target = 3000 new female entrepreneurs’ using the financial product Output Indicator 1.2 Target = an average of 55 percent (per quarter) of women reporting saving money Output Indicator 1.3 Target = an average of 55 percent (per quarter) of women reported feeling financially independent
Output Indicator 2.1 Target = 1800 female participants participating in the business accelerator Output Indicator 2.2 Target = an average of 55 percent (per quarter) of women been part of business accelerator using new digital tools in their business Output Indicator 2.3 Target = an average of 55 percent (per quarter) of women in the accelerator with increased digital literacy Output Indicator 2.4 Target = an average of 55 percent (per quarter) reported confidence in handling economic shock
Output Indicator 3.1 Target = an average of USD131,250 of microgrants disbursed to female entrepreneurs Output Indicator 3.2 Target = an average of 55 percent of female entrepreneurs having the ability to sustain their business with the grant

The project document was signed in December 2020. Therefore there is now results to show. Implementation of the RRF phase 2 begins in 2021
